entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
